title: Reclining Hand-to-Big-Toe
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Slowly release your leg with an exhale. Keep shoulder blades on floor Widen across collarbones Push bottom leg into floor Modification: Keep the lifted leg bent. Alternatively, drape a strap over the arch of the foot and hold onto both ends.
